Package org.teamfarce.mirch

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Application
    Initiates the Java Program.
    Assets
    This class manages all the assets.
    GameSnapshot
    Stores a snapshot of the game state.
    GUIController
    Generates and controls all GUI screens from the GUI controller.
    Journal
    The Journal stores relevant information to the players progress through the game.
    MIRCH
    MIRCH is used to generate all graphics in the program.
    OrthogonalTiledMapRendererWithPeople
    OrthogonalTiledMapRendererWithPeople This class is an extension of the OrthogonalTiledMapRenderer that deals with rendering sprites aswell.
    ScenarioBuilder  
    ScenarioBuilder.CharacterData  
    ScenarioBuilderDatabase  
    ScenarioBuilderDatabase.DataMotive  
    Settings
    This class is used for game wide CONSTANTS or VARIABLES
    Vector2Int
    This class defines a 2D vector to represent coordinates within the game.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GameState
    Represents different states in the game.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ScenarioBuilder.ScenarioBuilderException
